metadata.name: 11.1.c Share of total population in urban areas living in a dwelling with a leaking roof, damp walls, floors or foundation, or rot in window frames or floor
metadata.priority: Enhancement of cities and urbanised areas' capability for sustainable development and workplace creation as well as improvement of quality of life of their inhabitants
metadata.definition: Percentage of population in urban areas that declared, at least in one case, that they live in a dwelling with a leaking roof, damp walls, floors or foundation, or rot in window frames or floor.
metadata.methodology: The category of households includes persons that declared, at least in one case, that they live in a dwelling with a leaking roof, damp walls, floors or foundation, or rot in window frames or floor. The questions from the EU-SILC survey:  untill 2014: Does your dwelling have: a leaking roof, damp walls, floors or foundation or rot in window frames or floor? since 2015: Does your dwelling have: A. a leaking roof, B. damp walls/floors/foundation, C. rot in window frames or floor?
